active.title: Electric Trip Wire
active.desc: Routes a high voltage current line. Enemies passing through willl take damage and movement speed will decrease.

passive.title: Territorial Effect
passive.desc: increases team backup ammo and Sniper/LMG damage by 25%.

active.title: Medical Station
active.desc: Instantly rescue all downed teammates and continously heal allies in proximity.

passive.title: Medic
passive.desc: Increases team HP and Shotgun/SMG damage by 25%.

active.title: Active Camo
active.desc: Become invisible and increase movement speed.

passive.title: Voidwalker
passive.desc: Increases team movement speed while also raising Shotgun damage by 25% and doubling Pistol damage.

active.title: Sentry Gun
active.desc: Place a sentry gun that automatically attacks enemies within range.

passive.title: Firepower
passive.desc: Increases team fire rate and Sniper/Assault damage by 25%.

active.title: Ravager Launcher
active.desc: Deploy a Ravager Launcher that automatically locks onto enemy soldiers and vehicles within range.

passive.title: Demo Expert
passive.desc: Increases the damage of explosives by 100%.
